name: Lore
author: DM Brad
short: Query the Outline wiki for lore and world-building.
description: Search the Outline wiki for documents and get AI-flavored responses from the Oracle of Pyora. Features include backlinks, related search results, document images, and configurable prompts.
install_msg: Set your Outline API key with [p]set api outline api_key,<key>. Optionally set OpenAI key for AI flavor text. Configure with [p]loreconfig.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data about users.
